name: laterite quarry operation | laterite, mineral | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21976/documentation

This dataset is built on the bauxite mine operation/GLO (accessed on 20170823) dataset in which some exchanges have been edited to make it specific to extraction of laterite in India.Laterite is a residual ferruginous rock commonly found in tropical regions and has close association in terms of composition with bauxite. Laterite and bauxite show a tendency to occur together. Laterite occurance are widespread in the country. Almost all indian bauxite deposits are associated with laterite, except those in Jammu and Kashmir region. This dataset contain only laterite mining operation there is no coproduction of bauxite. As per the Goverment of India notification dated 10th february 2015, laterite has been declared as "Minor Mineral", hence the production beyond january 2015 is not available. Total laterite consumption by cement plant in India is 5.35 million tonnes.Laterite used in cement unit as an additives for lowering the clinkerisation temperature and supplementing aluminous and iron contents. 

Exploration, Mining, Drilling & Blasting

This activity ends with mined laterite at the quarry gate. This dataset includes  all transport within the quarry (for extraction and recultivation)
category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/081:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay/0810:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay
tags: Sector: Resource Extraction; Minerals; Cement & Concrete

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The data represent here is for year 2014-15. Since laterite were declared as minor mineral, data onward 2015 is not available. Uncertainty adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent for the state of Madhya Pradesh in India. This state is representing nearly 15% of laterite production on national scale.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This  dataset is built, on the bauxite mine operation/GLO (accessed 20170823) dataset in which some exchanges have been edited to make it specific to extraction of lateritein Madhya Pradesh, India. Uncertainty adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Environment Impact Assessment Report of Makdawan Laterite mine in state of Madhya Pradesh. Report were prepared to take environement clearance to enhance the mining lease area by considering its impact on environement. The report consists of Reserve, Life of mine, Expected production, Resources required, quality of air and water, waste generation and employment creation etc.
